Title: We Can Do That
Writer: Fabio Bonifacci (screenplay), Giulio Manfredonia (screenplay), Fabio Bonifacci (story)
Actors: Claudio Bisio, Anita Caprioli, Giuseppe Battiston, Giorgio Colangeli
Plot: Set in Italy in the early 1980s the film follows Nello (Claudio Bisio), the recently hired director of a newly developed work cooperative of former mental patients. After the closure of ...
